scripts.db.create: cd server/db && mysql -u root -p -e "drop database if exists PatientHealthData;create database PatientHealthData;"
scripts.db.tables: cd server/db && mysql -u root -p PatientHealthData < PatientHealthData.sql
scripts.sudo.db.create: cd server/db && sudo mysql -u root -e "drop database if exists PatientHealthData;create database PatientHealthData;"
scripts.sudo.db.tables: cd server/db && sudo mysql -u root -p PatientHealthData < PatientHealthData.sql
